summary: The document pertains to Solicitation FA301625Q0050 issued by the 502nd Contracting Squadron for the provision of eight Bleacher Seating Systems to support the 343rd Training Squadron at JBSA-Lackland, San Antonio, Texas. The document includes a release of financial information form, which is necessary for evaluating the financial responsibility of prospective contractors in accordance with FAR 9.104-1(a). Contractors are required to provide financial details and authorize the contracting squadron to verify this information before a contract award can be executed.
displayName: JBSA Lackland Bleacher Seating Systems Solicitation

summary: This Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the requirements for the purchase, assembly, and installation of bleacher seating systems at JBSA-Lackland and JBSA Camp Bullis, Texas. The contractor is responsible for providing all necessary personnel, equipment, and materials to install eight bleacher systems, each accommodating up to 125 personnel. The document specifies the delivery locations, seating specifications, and operational hours. It also details security requirements for contractor personnel, including background checks and vehicle access protocols. The contractor must conduct a demonstration of the system capabilities before installation, and the project will be subject to final acceptance by the Government. The document includes warranty, testing, and records management requirements, as well as guidelines for contract management and installation access.
displayName: JBSA Lackland Bleacher Seating Systems Installation

summary: This document is an attachment related to the solicitation FA301625Q0050 for bleacher seating systems at JBSA Lackland, TX. It contains financial information about the contractor, including details about their financial institution, account status, and financial practices. The document seeks to assess the contractor's financial stability and capability to fulfill the financial obligations of the project, which is valued in the six-figure range. Key inquiries include the duration of the contractor's account with the financial institution, their current financial status, the number and types of accounts held, operational balance, and availability of a line of credit. The document aims to ensure the contractor's financial reliability for the successful execution of the contract.
displayName: JBSA Lackland Bleacher Seating Systems Financial Info

summary: This document is a combined synopsis/solicitation for the procurement of eight Bleacher Seating Systems at Joint Base San Antonio (JBSA), Lackland, TX. It is issued as a Request for Quotation (RFQ) under solicitation number FA301625Q0050. The requirement is a 100% set-aside for Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) concerns, with NAICS Code 337127. The contract type will be Firm Fixed Price (FFP), and the award will be made to the lowest priced, technically acceptable offer. Quotes must be submitted by 4:00 p.m. CDT on July 21, 2025. The document outlines the criteria for technical acceptability and emphasizes that only the three lowest quotes deemed technically acceptable will be considered for evaluation. Funds are not currently available, and the government reserves the right to cancel the RFQ. No site visit is required, and the contractor must ensure all work is performed according to the Statement of Work (SOW).
displayName: JBSA Lackland Bleacher Seating Systems RFQ
